title: 25. The Concordant Ziggurats (LOA)
content:
IF YOU'VE POWERED UP THE ARCOLOGY GO TO 25.1

As the plains around Meadow rise up to meet the cliffs on the western edge of the Valley, you reach the first of the Concordant Ziggurats. Some say that they belong to a network of power stations, but no one knows for sure. There are five intact ziggurats in the Valley, along with the ruins of several others. Travelers from beyond claim to have seen them in distant lands as well.

As you near the base, you feel a resonant thrum. It vibrates the very air around you, causing pressure to build inside your head. The Ziggurats—whatever they are—yet live.
